data.comment: The match is underway in Den Haag.
Ruud Brood (Den Haag) is making a first substitution, with Bilal Ould-Chikh replacing Kees de Boer.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal! Mike Van Duinen heads Zwolle into a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 51, Sai Van Wermeskerken instrumental with a fine assist.
The home team have replaced Ricardo Kishna with Ravel Morrison. This is the second substitution made today by Ruud Brood.
Zwolle make their first substitution with Clint Leemans replacing Pelle Clement.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Samy Bourard with David Lennart Philipp.
John Goossens is on a sub for Pascu for Den Haag.
John Stegeman is making the team's second substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Jesper Drost replacing Reza Ghoochannejhad.
In the minute 75, Sam Kersten is booked for the away team.
Yuta Nakayama is replacing Rico Strieder for Zwolle at Cars Jeans Stadion.
The away team have replaced Dean Huiberts with Thomas Lam. This is the fourth substitution made today by John Stegeman.
In the minute 84, It's now 0-2 in Den Haag as Clint Leemans scores for Zwolle.
Bilal Ould-Chikh for Den Haag has been booked by Ingmar Oostrom and receives a first yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
